name: grpc-mock-hub
description: grpc-mock-hub is a versatile and easy-to-use Node.js module designed to simplify the process of mocking gRPC calls. Whether you're a developer testing components or an organization looking to streamline your testing process, grpc-mock-hub provides a comprehensive solution. It dynamically reads your proto files and generates mock servers, allowing you to focus on what matters most - building and testing your application. With grpc-mock-hub, you can create a robust testing environment that caters to your specific needs, making it an essential tool in any developer's toolkit.
